text:
Athiya Shetty's mysterious friendship with Canadian rapper Drake came into limelight when she had wished Daddy Suniel Shetty on his birthday. Reacting to Athiya's post, Drake's comment on the post proved that the duo shares a friendly equation. And now, looks like this friendship isn't fizzling out anytime soon.
Recently, it was Athiya's birthday and our social media feeds were full of wishes and photos of her. While she celebrated her birthday with her 'mains' that included family and industry friends, there were some wishes that managed to grab everyone's attention.
On Athiya's 26th birthday, rapper Drake had special wishes for her. He wrote,
Agencies
"Happy birthday to my Shetty a true Goddess. Guess who is watching Mubakaran 3 times on the tour bus in your honour."
That's not all, his wishes also included 'heart' emojis that might again spark dating rumors around the two of them.

While Drake's wishes were indeed sweet, what is really hard to digest is him mentioning her film Mubarakan. He mentioned how he watched the film thrice in her honor. But the real question is, how did he survive a film as absurd as this? We are pretty sure of the fact that he's the only person on this planet who braved to watched the film thrice.
What's cooking, you two? Is it the time for us to send you both 'Mubarakan' wishes already? Well!
title: Drake's Brave Attempt To Watch Athiya Shetty's 'Mubarakan' Thrice Deserves A Slow Clap
